ul.li: Possible keyword and interpretation: "top left" and "left top" both mean the same as "0%0%".

body.p: If statement above is passed, this paragraph should have a flag image which is to the top left of this paragraph text. The rule applied is "#id1 {background-position: top left}". Also "#id1 {background-color: lime; background-repeat: no-repeat;}". aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
